boardgame.name: World at War: Eisenbach Gap
World at War: Eisenbach Gap Deluxe Edition
boardgame.description: It's the summer of 1985 and Soviet tanks stream into West Germany. Thinly spread NATO forces strive to delay the red hordes until reinforcements arrive, and the world watches anxiously, dreading the nuclear weapons held in each super power's arsenal. Welcome to the dark world of Mark H. Walker's Award Winning World at War series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A platoon level simulation that stresses command, control, and war's unpredictable nature, World At War is an engaging, tactical action game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rules cover self-propelled mortars, thin-skinned vehicles, support weapons, ranged combat, opportunity fire, ATGM depletion, assault and overrun combat. Better still, World at War is not just a game, but also a game system. Learn Eisenbach Gap, and you can play any of the follow-on modules._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented by Eisenbach Gap Deluxe which also includes Death of the 1st Panzer._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2007 Charles S. Roberts Best Post-WWII Era Boardgame Nominee
2007 Charles S. Roberts Best Post-WWII Era Boardgame Winner
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: World at War: Battles within Battles
World at War: Blood and Bridges
World at War: Death of the 1st Panzer

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Lock _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;N Load Publishing, LLC (LLP 4000) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the summer of 1985 and Soviet tanks stream into West Germany. Thinly spread NATO forces strive to delay the red hordes until reinforcements arrive, and the world watches anxiously, dreading the nuclear weapons held in each super power_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s arsenal. Welcome to the dark world of Mark H. Walker_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s World at War.
A platoon level simulation that stresses command, control, and war_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s unpredictable nature, World At War is an engaging, tactical action game. See About the Game, below to discover the unique mechanics that make this game so much fun. World at War: Eisenbach Gap Charles S. Roberts Award Winner for Best Modern Era Game in 2007. World at War simulates, on a platoon-level, the war which began May 12, 1985 when Junior Lieutenant Yuri Andromnivitch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s T-72 sent a 125mm HE round screaming into the guard tower on the ridge at Dankmarshausen, ripping mortar from rebar and sending head-sized chunks of concrete tumbling into the red-roofed houses below. Units activate by chit draw and formation, fire in a flurry of dice, and look good doing it. The rules cover self-propelled mortars, thin-skinned vehicles, support weapons, ranged combat, opportunity fire, ATGM depletion, assault and overrun combat. Better still, World at War is not just a game, but also a game system. Learn Eisenbach Gap, and you can play any of the follow-on modules. See About the Game , below, for more details. The game ships in a box with the following components: One hundred twenty eight (128) gorgeous die-cut 5/8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; counters. One professionally drawn, printed, and MOUNTED 17_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; x 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; map. Six scenarios, 2 players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; aid cards, and 4 dice. A 16-page rule, scenario, and chart book.

Very gently played copy. Nothing missing or damaged. Box has some very minor shelf-wear but has no splits or dents. Counters have been neatly clipped. Everything is sorted and stored neatly in a Chessex-style counter tray. Includes the counters, rulebook, and map for DEATH OF THE FIRST PANZER expansion.
Excellent condition, punched and clipped, played once. I also have several other games from the World at War series for sale.

Shrinkwrap copy. No holes in the shrink. No box damage. Straight from the factory minty fresh. Unsoiled by human hands and waiting to be opened. Worldwide shipping and will be packed well. All forms of negotiable instruments considered. Combine ship with multiple purchases.

Lock _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;N Load Publishing (LLP4000) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the new and improved Eisenbach Gap - Eisenbach Gap Deluxe. One game that includes all the components of both the original Eisenbach Gap and Death of First Panzer. The maps are mounted and the rules and player aid cards are full color. This is a great chance to dive into the popular World at War system with the first two modules packed in one box. Units activate by chit draw and formation, fire in a flurry of dice. The rules cover self-propelled mortars, thin-skinned vehicles, support weapons, ranged combat, opportunity fire, ATGM depletion, assault and overrun combat. Learn Eisenbach Gap Deluxe, and you can play any of the follow-on modules. Eisenbach Gap_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s six scenarios simulate the Soviet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s initial thrust into West Germany, pitting American against Russian, M1 Abrams against T-72. Death of First Panzer continues the story with a new map, new counters and six additional scenarios depicting the Bundeswehr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s (The West German Army) desperate battle against the Soviet horde.

Neither has been played and you can consider the counters punched, since they are falling out of the trees, and will probably all be out of the trees by the time you get it. The counters are all there, and placed in ziplock bags so they don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t go AWOL. These are both First Edition copies, not the Deluxe Edition.
First edition reprint of Eisenbach Gap (normal thickness counters) plus Death of the 1st Panzer. Game and expansion are both unpunched, complete and in excellent condition.

This is a great chance to dive into the popular World at War system with the first two modules packed in one box. Units activate by chit draw and formation, fire in a flurry of dice. The rules cover self-propelled mortars, thin-skinned vehicles, support weapons, ranged combat, opportunity fire, ATGM depletion, assault and overrun combat. Learn Eisenbach Gap Deluxe, and you can play any of the follow-on modules. Eisenbach Gap_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s six scenarios simulate the Soviet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s initial thrust into West Germany, pitting American against Russian, M1 Abrams against T-72. Death of First Panzer continues the story with a new map, new counters and six additional scenarios depicting the Bundeswehr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s (The West German Army) desperate battle against the Soviet horde.
Game is for the deluxe edition. Game is in shrink and also includes the bonus scenarios (two) given to customers who pre-ordered the game.
